titleStmt.title: Pirāṉmalai, X temple, time of X, year X

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
svasti śrīman mahāmaṇṭalīśvaran a varāyar vibhā(ṭa)n bhāṣaikkut tappuva rāyaru kaṇṭan mūvarāyara kaṇṭan kaṇṭa nāṭu koṇṭu koṇṭa nāṭu kuṭātāṉ rājādhirājar rāja paramēśvara pūrva dakṣaṇa paccima uttara catu ssamudrādhipati śrī vīra pradāpa śrīmat Accuta deva mahārāya
r prudivi rājyam paṇṇi aruḷāniṉṟa śakābdam 1452 ṉ mēl cellāniṉ(ṟa) vikuṟuti samvatsarattu uttarāyanattu hēma rituvāṉa makara nāyiṟu sukla pakṣattu pañcamiy rēvati nakṣatramum pu3da vāramum siddha yōkamum peṟṟa sa0krama puṇya kālattu
tirumalai nāṭṭut tiruk koṭuṅkuṉṟa māṉa dakṣiṇa kayilāsattu pra dicaiyilk kallāra maṭattu bhikṣā maḍa santāṉa māna lakṣādyāyi santāṉattu goḷaki dhammattu kā3yatri gotrattu yajar vēdattu paripāla ta(ra)rāṉa li maṇṭalādhipati pāṇṭya nāṭṭu mutaliya
āṉa īśāna śivan dhamma śāsanap paṭṭaiyaṅ koṭuttapaṭi kēraḷa ciṅka vaḷanāṭṭu ma nirupaśekara caturvēti maṅkalattu sapai kavucika gotrattu ā(cva)lāya, sūtrattu (i )nātar putran āvācaka nāraṇa valaṅkāra nampi kuṭutta ūr
kēraḷaciṅka vaḷanāṭṭu piraiyūr paṟṟu nammuṭai maṭappuramāṉa maṭattūr perunāṉ kellaik kuṭpaṭṭa nañcai puñ(cai) kuḷamum miḷa ṉa perunāṉ kuḷamum vayalu nañcai puñcaiyaḷum nattañ ceyttalai kuṭā paṭukai viṭṭa āṟṟukkā lūṟṟu māvaṭai maravaṭai
maṟṟum uḷḷa nidhi nikṣepa jala pāṣā ṇādi ṣabhoga tēca cuvāmiyamum uḷpaṭṭa dānādi vinimayaṅkaḷukkum yōgyamāka santati pravēśamāka candrādityasādi āka aṉupavi(k)kavum dāna pālina yōgam
vara nāku pālanāda cadhiratam va svadattātanuku3ṇa puṇyam paradattānu pālanam ttā pahāraṇē svadattam niṣlam bhavēt ēvam pāṇayam ṇayalādipat īśānam śubham astu
This edition by G. Vijayavenugopal (2022). Reviewed by Emmanuel Francis (2024), based on photos (N. Ramaswamy).
